00073 template <class Interface>
00074 TMultiFactoryMember<Interface>::TMultiFactoryMember()
00075 :      m_definitionComponentPtr(NULL)
00076 {

00079 
00080 template <class Interface>
00081 void TMultiFactoryMember<Interface>::Init(const IComponent* ownerPtr, const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo)
00082 {
00083        BaseClass::InitInternal(ownerPtr, staticInfo, &m_definitionComponentPtr);
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 template <class Interface>
00088 bool TMultiFactoryMember<Interface>::IsValid() const
00089 {
00090        return (m_definitionComponentPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::IsValid();
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095 template <class Interface>
00096 IComponent* TMultiFactoryMember<Interface>::CreateComponent(int index) const
00097 {
00098        if ((m_definitionComponentPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::IsValid()){
00099               const ICompositeComponent* parentPtr = m_definitionComponentPtr->GetParentComponent();
00100               if (parentPtr != NULL){
00101                      const QByteArray& componentId = BaseClass::operator[](index);
00102 
00103                      QByteArray baseId;
00104                      QByteArray subId;
00105                      BaseClass2::SplitId(componentId, baseId, subId);
00106                      Q_ASSERT(subId.isEmpty());  // explicit subelement ID are not implemented correctly
00107 
00108                      return parentPtr->CreateSubcomponent(baseId);
00109               }
00110               else{
00111                      qCritical("Component %s is defined, but definition component has no parent", BaseClass::operator[](index).constData());
00112               }
00113        }
00114 
00115        return NULL;
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 template <class Interface>
00120 Interface* TMultiFactoryMember<Interface>::CreateInstance(int index) const
00121 {
00122        istd::TDelPtr<IComponent> newComponentPtr(CreateComponent(index));
00123        if (newComponentPtr.IsValid()){
00124               Interface* retVal = BaseClass2::ExtractInterface<Interface>(newComponentPtr.GetPtr());
00125               if (retVal != NULL){
00126                      newComponentPtr.PopPtr();
00127 
00128                      return retVal;
00129               }
00130        }
00131 
00132        return NULL;
00133 }

00139 Interface* TMultiFactoryMember<Interface>::ExtractInterface(IComponent* componentPtr, const QByteArray& subId)
00140 {
00141        return BaseClass2::ExtractInterface<Interface>(componentPtr, subId);
00142 }
